name: CIPP Best Practices v1.0 - Tenant view

FrontendFields.name: Password Never Expires
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the password never expires setting. This setting is expected to be set to 'No'

FrontendFields.name: OAuth App Consent
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled OAuth App Consent. This setting is expected to be set to 'Yes'

FrontendFields.name: Unified Audit Log
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the unified audit log. This setting is expected to be set to 'Yes'

FrontendFields.name: MFA Registration Campaign Enabled
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the MFA registration campaign, also known as the MFA Nudge. This setting is recommended to be set to 'Yes'

FrontendFields.name: Temporary Access Pass Enabled
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the temporary access pass feature.

FrontendFields.name: Secure Defaults State Enabled
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the secure defaults state. If you are using Conditional Access this setting may be set to `No`

FrontendFields.name: Anonymous Privacy Reports
FrontendFields.desc: This setting shows if your environment has enabled the anonymous privacy reports, these will need to be disabled to be able to view mailboxes and onedrive reports

FrontendFields.name: Message Copy for Sent-As Disabled
FrontendFields.desc: These are the mailboxes that have the MessageCopyForSentAsDisabled setting enabled.

FrontendFields.name: Shared Mailboxes with enabled users
FrontendFields.desc: These are the shared mailboxes that have enabled users.

FrontendFields.name: Unused licenses
FrontendFields.desc: These are the licenses that are not assigned to an user, but have been purchased.

FrontendFields.name: Current Secure Score
FrontendFields.desc: The current Secure Score for this tenant. This is the sum of all the individual controls that have been implemented.

FrontendFields.name: Max Secure Score
FrontendFields.desc: The maximum Secure Score for this tenant. This is the sum of all the individual controls that can be implemented.
